user.title: San Francisco Water Setup
user.description:
Connect to your SFPUC account to monitor water usage.

Required: SFPUC username and password from {url}

 Water Sensor
• Daily usage in gallons (cumulative)
• Updates every 12 hours

Configuration Tips:
• Username is typically your account number or email
• Password is your SFPUC portal password
• Data updates automatically every 12 hours
• All data is stored locally in Home Assistant database

data_description.username: Your SFPUC account username or account number used to login to the water portal.
data_description.password: Your SFPUC account password for accessing usage data.

error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password. Please check your SFPUC credentials and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred during setup. Please check your internet connection and try again.

init.title: San Francisco Water Power Sewer Configuration
init.description:
San Francisco Water Power Sewer integration uses automatic settings optimized for daily water usage data. Updates occur every 12 hours to stay current with SFPUC data while respecting server resources.

**Current Settings:**
• Update interval: Fixed at 12 hours
• Data source: SFPUC daily usage
• Storage: Local Home Assistant database

No configuration changes are needed.
